ModMetaData.name: Civilization Beyond Earth Armor Sets
ModMetaData.author: JangoD'soul,ParaNautic(chrissmooth25)
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds Civilization Beyond Earth armor From the Soldier Tree
[h1]Features:[/h1] - Tier 1 Soldier Helemet - Tier 1 Soldier Armor Suit - Tier 1 Soldier Carbine - Helemt and Suit in 6 difference colors : Red,Blue,Green,Purple,Orange,Yellow.
[h1]ResearchPrerequisite:[/h1] - GasOperation: Soldier Carbine - FlakArmor: Soldier Helemet and Suits
Commissioned by "JangoD'soul" for "ParaNautic(chrissmooth25)#7464" from "Rimworld Mod Market" Discord.
[h1]Credits:[/h1] -Civilization Beyond Earth -JangoDsoul- Art and XML coder
[url=https://discord.gg/7B7xqHh][img]https://i.imgur.com/cfoFEMA.png[/img][/url]
